Name: Berry Flip
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: A most unusual brandy-laced flip with rich blackberry and lingering ginger spice. Slightly on the sweet side.
History: Created in 2015 by William Baker at Fu Manchu in Clapham North, London, England.
